std::unique_ptr<Model> glr::models::ModelLoader::loadModel ( const std::string &  filename,
IdManager &  idManager 
)

Loads model data from the file specified by filename.

Parameters
filenameThe file we want to load
idManager
Returns
A vector of ModelData objects (as shared pointers). We do this so as not to have to copy the model data when we return from this method.
